name: DynamicComponent

properties.name: alerts
properties.description: Alerts related to the dynamic component. Can either be set by the dynamic component it self or via it's resolvers.
properties.rawdescription:
Alerts related to the dynamic component.
Can either be set by the dynamic component it self or via it's resolvers.

properties.name: config
properties.description: The configuration which is shared between configuration component and display component. Should be searilzabled to allow to save it to the API.
properties.rawdescription:
The configuration which is shared between configuration component and display component.
Should be searilzabled to allow to save it to the API.

properties.name: ng1FormRef
properties.deprecationMessage: : Will not work on Angular-Dashboards (1.6.1.0). Use `ContextServiceDashboard.formDisabled` instead.
properties.description: A reference to the ng1Form on angularjs dashboards to disable/enable the save button.
properties.rawdescription: A reference to the ng1Form on angularjs dashboards to disable/enable the save button.

jsdoctags.comment: : Will not work on Angular-Dashboards (1.6.1.0). Use ContextServiceDashboard.formDisabled instead.

description: Use this interface on any component to define the interchange between config and display component.
rawdescription:
Use this interface on any component to define the interchange between
config and display component.
